question: Are we capturing both behavioral (user-system) and domain (concept-relationship) criteria?
outcome: Ensures comprehensive coverage of both user interactions and domain concepts
options: Behavioral only – Focus on user-system interactions and user-facing behavior
Domain only – Focus on domain concepts, relationships, and business rules
Both behavioral and domain – Capture user-system interactions AND domain concepts/relationships
Behavioral primary, domain secondary – Emphasize user interactions with domain concepts as supporting context
Domain primary, behavioral secondary – Emphasize domain structure with user interactions as examples
